items.title: Blog
items.content_text: Discover our latest AI breakthroughs, projects, and updates.

items.title: AlphaGenome: AI for better understanding the genome
items.content_text: Introducing a new, unifying DNA sequence model that advances regulatory variant-effect prediction and promises to shed new light on genome function — now available via API.

items.title: A catalogue of genetic mutations to help pinpoint the cause of diseases
items.content_text:
New AI tool classifies the effects of 71 million ‘missense’ mutations 
Uncovering the root causes of disease is one of the greatest challenges in human genetics. With millions of possible...

items.title: AlphaProteo generates novel proteins for biology and health research
items.content_text: New AI system designs proteins that successfully bind to target molecules, with potential for advancing drug design, disease understanding and more.

items.title: AlphaEvolve: A Gemini-powered coding agent for designing advanced algorithms
items.content_text: New AI agent evolves algorithms for math and practical applications in computing by combining the creativity of large language models with automated evaluators

items.title: AI achieves silver-medal standard solving International Mathematical Olympiad problems
items.content_text: Breakthrough models AlphaProof and AlphaGeometry 2 solve advanced reasoning problems in mathematics

items.title: Millions of new materials discovered with deep learning
items.content_text: We share the discovery of 2.2 million new crystals  –  equivalent to nearly 800 years’ worth of knowledge. We introduce Graph Networks for Materials Exploration (GNoME), our new deep learning tool...

items.title: Accelerating fusion science through learned plasma control
items.content_text: Successfully controlling the nuclear fusion plasma in a tokamak with deep reinforcement learning

items.title: AlphaQubit tackles one of quantum computing’s biggest challenges
items.content_text: AlphaQubit is an AI-based decoder that identifies quantum computing errors with state-of-the-art accuracy.

items.title: Genie 3: A New Frontier for World Models
items.content_text: Today we are announcing Genie 3, a general purpose world model that can generate an unprecedented diversity of interactive environments. Given a text prompt, Genie 3 can generate dynamic worlds...

items.title: Claude Opus 4.1
items.content_text: Anthropic is an AI safety and research company that's working to build reliable, interpretable, and steerable AI systems.

items.title: Anthropic raises $13B Series F at $183B post-money valuation
items.content_text: Anthropic has completed a Series F fundraising of $13 billion led by ICONIQ. This financing values Anthropic at $183 billion post-money. Along with ICONIQ, the round was co-led by Fidelity Management & Research Company and Lightspeed Venture Partners. The investment reflects Anthropic’s continued momentum and reinforces our position as the leading intelligence platform for enterprises, developers, and power users.

items.title: Thoughts on America’s AI Action Plan
items.content_text: Anthropic is an AI safety and research company that's working to build reliable, interpretable, and steerable AI systems.

items.title: Claude for Financial Services
items.content_text: Today, we're introducing a comprehensive solution for financial analysis that transforms how finance professionals analyze markets, conduct research, and make investment decisions with Claude.

items.title: Strengthening our safeguards through collaboration with US CAISI and UK AISI
items.content_text: Anthropic is an AI safety and research company that's working to build reliable, interpretable, and steerable AI systems.

items.title: Claude introduces memory for teams at work
items.content_text: Claude now remembers your team's projects and preferences across conversations. Memory helps maintain context for complex work, with project-specific boundaries and full user control over what's remembered.

items.title: Claude can now create and use files
items.content_text: Claude can now create and edit Excel spreadsheets, documents, PowerPoint slide decks, and PDFs directly in Claude.ai and the desktop app.

items.title: Anthropic is endorsing SB 53
items.content_text: Anthropic is endorsing SB 53, the California bill that governs powerful AI systems built by frontier AI developers like Anthropic.

items.title: Updating restrictions of sales to unsupported regions

items.title: Anthropic joins White House pledge for AI education
items.content_text: Anthropic signs White House pledge investing in AI education for America's youth, supporting AI students and educators nationwide
